label.description: Character or expression of text to be plotted

fontcolor.description: A character value specifying text fontcolor

fontsize.description: A numeric specifying text fontsize in points

rot.description: A numeric specifying the angle to rotate the text

check.overlap.description: A logical value to indicate whether to checkfor and omit overlapping text

x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying text x-location

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vector ofvalues containing a "b" combined with a numeric valuespecifying text y-locations

just.description: Justification of text relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x} or \code{y} are only given as numerics or numeric vectors

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
